actions.text: Amendment SA 3439, under the order of 12/21/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative,  not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 235.

Amendment SA 3439 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S8455-8461; text: CR S8455-8456) To require a report on the impact of the FISA Amendments Act of 2008 on the privacy of the people of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3439 proposed by Senator Wyden.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3439, under the order of 12/21/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative,  not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 235.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3439, under the order of 12/21/12, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative,  not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 52. Record Vote Number: 235.

purpose: To require a report on the impact of the FISA Amendments Act of 2008 on the privacy of the people of the United States.
